title: Beverage Box
description:
Originally proposed as Juice, this emoji can be used to talk about juice or other liquids that come in boxes with straws. It can also be used metaphorically to talk about power, energy, respect, or an elusive quality that makes someone special.

While intended to be used to represent a broad selection of juices and other liquids, most vendors' designs feature a ğŸ Red Apple symbol. ğŸ‡ Grapes, ğŸŠTangerine, ğŸ‘ Peach, ğŸ’ Cherries, ğŸ Pear, and a ğŸŒ Sun with Face across other more distinct designs.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's beverage box emoji presents a familiar, stylized carton with a subtle gloss and soft, rounded corners, suggesting a refreshing drink inside. The design on Apple devices often includes a hint of realistic lighting that makes the carton appear almost tangible, evoking a sense of thirst-quenching refreshment and convenience. This emoji is commonly used to represent drinks like juice, milk, or other beverages, perfect for discussions about snacks or hydration.
